p: By using SPME headspace sampling and GC-MS, 67 chemical compounds were separated and identified from the cinnamon oil comprising 98.39% of the total volume. The dominant constituents were trans-cinnamaldehyde (49.82%), p-cymene (10.52%), benzaldehyde (8.23%), α-phellandrene (7.56%), benzenepropanal (2.07%), α-copaene (2.01%), 2-anisaldehyde (1.88%), α-pinene (1.64%), cis-ß-ocimene (1.50%), styrene (1.23%), phenylethyl alcohol (1.07%), cinnamyl acetate (1.04%) ( Table S1).
